app.title: Data Intake MVP
items: Built a minimal user form to submit core inputs (name, birthdate/time/place, question).
Added client/server validation with clear error states and helper texts.
Implemented basic loading states and result placeholder to prepare for API integration.

app.title: OpenAI Integration & Baseline Evaluation
items: Connected to OpenAI API; introduced structured prompts for explanatory output.
Benchmarked AI responses against early manual algorithms—kept AI for narrative/explanation only due to accuracy gap.
Logged model latency and token usage for later optimization; added basic rate limiting to protect the endpoint.

app.title: Containerization & AWS Staging
items: Created production-ready Dockerfile using multi-stage builds to minimize image size and improve security.
Configured .dockerignore to reduce build context and prevent sensitive files from being shipped.
Deployed Docker image to Amazon ECR (Elastic Container Registry), enabling centralized versioned storage.
Launched EC2 instance (Amazon Linux 2) as a staging environment; installed Docker and configured persistent volumes.
Bound EC2 instance role with minimal ECR pull permissions (IAM role vs. static keys) to enforce security best practices.
Added basic systemd service for container auto-restart, ensuring resilience in case of failure.
Documented deployment runbook for manual redeploys prior to automation stage.

app.title: Terraform IaC Foundations
items: Implemented Infrastructure as Code using Terraform to provision EC2, VPC networking, and IAM roles.
Created Terraform modules for security groups (restricted ports: SSH, HTTP/HTTPS), improving infra hygiene.
Configured Terraform state management (local, with roadmap to S3 backend + DynamoDB lock for HA).
Added IAM module: created role for EC2 with scoped-down policies (AmazonEC2ContainerRegistryReadOnly, CloudWatchAgentServerPolicy).
Separated developer IAM users from service roles, following principle of least privilege.
Introduced variables.tf and outputs.tf for reusability and modular deployments.
Added tagging convention for AWS resources (project, owner, environment), aiding cost tracking and compliance.

app.title: CI/CD Pipeline (GitHub Actions)
items: Set up GitHub Actions workflow: on commit → build Docker image → push to ECR → trigger EC2 deployment.
Used self-hosted runner on EC2 for zero-downtime rollout and rollback testing.
Introduced environment-specific branches (dev, staging, prod) with deployment matrix.
Configured GitHub Secrets for AWS credentials; replaced static keys with OIDC federated identity (GitHub → AWS) for short-lived tokens.
IAM hardening: created GitHub role with ECR push + EC2 deploy permissions only; separated build/deploy accounts.
Integrated smoke tests post-deployment to validate container health and API readiness.
Documented CI/CD flow including branching strategy, release tagging, rollback steps, and IAM trust policies.

app.title: End-to-End Automation & Algorithm R&D
items: Verified full automation path from commit to container rollout on EC2.
Bootstrapped proprietary astrology engine (Zi Wei Dou Shu / Bazi / Qimen scaffolding).
Separated calculation layer from explanation layer; used simulated chart data for early tests.

app.title: Time-Based Divination Modules
items: Added time-based divination flows for specific questions (e.g., event timing/decision support).
Continued refactoring of the core engine interfaces to support modular methods.
Regression-tested cloud automation; ensured idempotent deploys and rollback notes.

app.title: Cloud Hardening, IAM & Monitoring
items: Optimized CI/CD pipeline with dependency caching, reducing build time by ~30%.
Enabled AWS CloudWatch logging for EC2 and container logs; added custom log groups for app/API events.
Configured CloudWatch Alarms to detect high CPU, memory, or disk usage; wired alerts to email notification.
IAM hardening: rotated EC2 instance profiles, added CloudWatchAgentServerPolicy, restricted ECR roles to pull-only in staging.
Separated IAM users for dev/test/prod; enforced MFA for console access.
Restricted security groups: closed unused ports, enforced HTTPS-only public endpoints.
Added `/healthz` endpoint for health checks and tied to CloudWatch for availability tracking.
Implemented request throttling middleware in app layer to mitigate brute force or DDoS-like traffic.
Reviewed AWS Cost Explorer reports, set budget alarms; IAM billing role created for read-only finance team access.

app.title: Chinese Core Algorithm & Divination
items: Implemented Chinese core algorithm entry points; aligned output schema for downstream UI.
Added divination templates and story templates; expanded requirements.txt with pinned versions.
Validated end-to-end: app now handles a basic query via API and returns structured, explainable results.
